title: Player Banned.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Due to the extreme nature of toxic behavior in your recent matches, your account has been permanently suspended. Please check your e-mail for detailed feedback about your punishment. As it states? But sadly it haven't sent anything to my email, Which worries me, I admit i was a bit toxic last game, I was with a lux full ap runes ignite and thunderlords degree as my support in my promotional games... It pissed me off and I might've cussed him out but will they reall suspend a 5 year old account juts like that? Like 1 game and pow account gone without futher notice?{{item:3070}}

replies.body: You must've gotten severe reports every day, to be banned. A miniscule amount of players get banned everyday.

Hey man,

**Riot** has recently stopped sending chat logs through email. **Riot Tantram** goes over why that is [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/xFkqPGRo-perm-banned-for-playing-with-a-boostedadc-yasuo-and-his-4-man-queue?comment=0005000400010000000000000000) if you're interested.

If you want to see your reform card, just log into your account normally through the client, and you'll find it there. Alternatively, you can contact [**Riot** Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and ask them to send you your chat logs.

Sorry about the notification being wrong, hopefully **Riot** clears it up soon.

There is a 0% chance they banned you because of One game. You would of had to be reported consecutively over multiple games. As of no follow up, Riot's always been quite poor with the Support Department. I sent them an issue from their website, never got a response.

TOXIC. HEARBY BANISHED FROM THIS SERVER.
jk
I feels for you man. Good luck with what happens.
